tool_description: Retrieves Brazilian stocks & Fiis (Brazilian reits counterparts) financial data.
name: Fundamentus
title: Fundamentus

api_list.name: FII
api_list.description: Retrieves market data for any Brazilian FII.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fundamentus.p.rapidapi.com/fii/hglg11"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fundamentus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fundamentus.p.rapidapi.com/fii/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fundamentus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
